name: CubeLand Horror Adventure
description:
FIRST OFF THIS GAME IS VERY VERY VERY EARLY ACCESS WITH THAT BEING SAID AS I CONTINUE MAKING IT THINGS WILL GET ALOT BETTER!

With that out of the way this game i have had the idea for it for a while...

this game will look like your average platformer but in the beginning this will happen here and there, and then when you find out whats going on, you might be suprised.

As the game gets updated this small discription will start to become more and more true and also be expanded a bit more here and there.
